data.text: Megblɔ be, “Malé ŋku ɖe nye mɔwo ŋu,
Gake esi mezi ɖoɖoe li kpoo,
Nye dzi xɔ dzo ɖe dɔ me nam;
“O! Yehowa, fia nye agbe ƒe nuwuwu
Èwɔ nye ŋkekewo wole abe asi ƒe kekeme ko ene,
“Aƒetɔ, ke azɔ la, nu ka makpɔ mɔ na?
Ɖem tso nye vodadawo katã me,
Ɖe wò tohehe si le dzinye la ɖa;
Èkaa mo, eye nèhea to na amewo ɖe woƒe nu vɔ̃wo ta;
Ɖe ŋku ɖa le ŋunye, ale be magakpɔ dzidzɔ hafi mayi,
